data_types.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We use personal and non-personal information to deliver the basic functionality of the Products/Services; provide functionality to certain features that you choose to use; allow you to create, modify, and view your account information; and allow you to customize, rate, and review the Products/Services.
We may use any means that you have provided us to contact you, such as the email address you use to register for and log in to your account.
When you register or update your account, make a purchase online...

TP_sharing.third_party_sharing_practice_mentioned_i: Your personal and non-personal information may be provided to our partners for use in their promotional and/or marketing practices.

your_rights.rights_mentioned_in_text: Using the Products/Services, you can access and may be able to edit or remove the personal information you have provided to us.

you may upload/share/post on our website or through our Products/Services.
